title: Colin talks with Stadium Basketball Analyst Jeff Goodman
itunes:title: Colin talks with Stadium Basketball Analyst Jeff Goodman
description:
Colin talks with Stadium Basketball Analyst Jeff Goodman about the mess that Kyrie Irving has become, what the Lakers can do to get Anthony Davis, and who the sleepers are in the upcoming NBA draft in this exclusive podcast.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
